cause.description:
MicroAid Projects is a family to family charity where online micro-projects are a catalyst to unlock human potential in poor villages.
Low income individuals, who are stuck on the poverty line, select a learning activity so they can "try something new for a day". By learning a new skill they may discover a new business opportunity that they can go on to develop.
1. Low income families have potential that can be unlocked
2. Micro-aid is needed to ensure people have a good business idea before getting a micro-credit loan
cause.mission: Using family enterprise to eradicate poverty
cause.name: MicroAid Projects
